snippet.title: Rogue possum runs wild inside Channel 9 studios
snippet.content:
A possum's mad dash through the Channel 9 studio has been caught on camera as intrepid employees try to usher it back outside.
The little marsupial is determined on its course, shrugging off even a broom to the face on its adventure.
Whether cute and cuddly, small and bitey, or anything in between, a wayward animal can turn the most neatly-ordered studio set into chaos.
